title: Control Your Hands
summary: Learn about how to keep the golf club "connected" to your body for better ball-striking with all your clubs.

title: Create More Speed
summary: Let's get our hands and wrists involved in our golf swing to help us generate more club head speed.

title: Flush Your Wedges
summary: With a small visual aid, we can create better contact and better wedge shots.

title: Hit Crisper Irons
summary: Use this simple drill to help you hit crisper, better iron shots on the course.

title: Hybrid Hoax
summary: Turn your hybrids into a powerhouse by hitting them more like your irons.

title: Putter Face Error
summary: Like other clubs in our bag, we need to be able to control the face of our putter.

title: Putting Under Pressure
summary: Less pressure on your putter grip is essential to being a better putter.

title: Roll the Dice
summary: Let's make our practice fun with this game to help us putt under pressure.

title: Trail Arm Key
summary: This simple rehearsal will help with your trail arm and hitting better shots.

title: Impact
summary: Learn about how to improve your ball-striking with these simple tips and drills.

title: Swing Fundamentals
summary: Learn how you can improve your golf game with only a few minutes of practice a day.

title: Load & Explode
summary: With just a sleeping bag and a golf club, we can increase our power and distance.

title: Playing Under Pressure
summary: Let's change how we practice to prepare for playing under pressure on the course.

title: Hit Up On the Ball
summary: With our driver in hand, let's work on hitting up on the ball for better tee shots.

title: Form & Perform
summary: Pre-shot routine is critical to success on the golf course. Form a plan then perform it.

title: Start at the Front
summary: Learn the correct backswing position by focusing on the front of your golf swing.

title: The Lead Wrist
summary: Taking the lead from Justin Rose, let's focus on better lead wrist position with our driver.

title: Swing the Rope
summary: Using just a rope, we can work on speed and tempo for better ball-striking.

title: Two Club Drill
summary: Using two clubs in our hands, we can practice better tempo and speed.

title: Putting
summary: With just 2 tees, we can improve the path of our putting stroke and make more putts.

title: Putting Tempo
summary: Use this simple drill to improve your putting tempo and make more putts.
